metadata.title: CVE-2023-52600 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: jfs:fix uaf in jfs_evict_inode When the execution of diMount(ipimap) fails, theobject ipimap that has been released may be accessed in diFreeSpecial().Asynchronous ipimap release occurs when rcu_core() calls jfs_free_node().Therefore, when diMount(ipimap) fails, sbi->ipimap should not beinitialized as ipimap.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-28-generic - 6.5.0-28.29
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-28-generic - 6.5.0-28.29
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-28-generic-64k - 6.5.0-28.29
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1018-aws - 6.5.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1018-gcp - 6.5.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1014-laptop - 6.5.0-1014.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-28-lowlatency - 6.5.0-28.29.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-28-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-28.29.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1021-oracle - 6.5.0-1021.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1021-oracle-64k - 6.5.0-1021.21
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1015-raspi - 6.5.0-1015.18
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1012-starfive - 6.5.0-1012.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-28.29').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1018.18').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1019.20').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1018.18').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1014.17').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-28.29.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1021.21').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1015.18').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1012.13').
